titleStmt.title: The Christian temper: or, The quiet state of mind that God's servants labour for Set forth in a sermon at the funeral of Mrs. Ursula Collins. By D.B.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns, at the lower end of Cheapside, and Robert Gibbs at the Golden Ball in Chancery-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
